overview: Everyday Samrat wakes up with the sound of the quarreling of her parents. He doesn't like to study rather he feels comfort and forgets everything when he is in the playground or having fun with friends in the tea-tong of markets. One day their Bangla teacher tells them that the best student will get a chance to go to the picnic. That grew attention in Samrat to go to the picnic for the first time of his life. Out of the, he started studying hard. But suddenly his dad becomes sick, but that doesn't grab any attention of Samrat rather he keeps himself busy with study.
title: A Family
